name: Chronofort
description:
A tower defense game made for the Black and White Jam #8! The theme was "Loop," and the game follows a roguelite-style game progression where you loop from the beginning after unlocking upgrades permanently, giving you more options to strategize and build around tower placement.

This is my first ever game jam, and was also solo, so I definitely ran into a lot of shortcomings I didn't expect to see! Nevertheless, it was the most fun I've had building a game project and I experienced many invaluable learning moments throughout the process.

I was planning on adding sound effects, but unfortunately I pushed it back too far and ended up running out of time to add them  because of some build errors that popped up on the last day.

I'm definitely going to continue working on this project, so if you like it or have some feedback or criticism please please please let me know!
